FuncDef: This command enables TCP MSS adjust for L2TPv3 tunnels on the public side on the group or tunnel level. When the command is configured, the system updates the TCP MSS option value of the received TCP SYN packet on the public side that is encapsulated in the L2TPv3 tunnel.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the new TCP MSS value in octets. Values-512 to 9000.
Specifies to use the upper-level configuration.
